name: TalkPolitics
_source: s;VillagerWoman;It's a ludicrous policy.{w}{br}It's vindictive and cruel, not preventative.
s;VillagerWoman;Just? You'll take the hands off pickpockets-{w}{br}how is that justice?
s;Anuki;Sounds fine to me.{w}{br}Crime needs to be prevented somehow.
s;KnightGirlGeneric;Thank you! Justice is doing what is helpful to your friends and harmful to your enemies.{w}{br}Crime is rising throughout the city, and you'd have us do nothing?
s;VillagerWoman;What you're talking about is a punishment I'd expect in the old regime.{w}{br}Why are you so desperate to repeat their mistakes?
